name: The Quarantrees (zerbinoo)
description:
QUARANTREES

The kid just won't stop moving so block him by moving the trees with the mouse !

You can also drag the virus monsters out of the way (but watch out if they're angry...)

Some powerups are here to clean this mess :) 

Made in duo with  Alon

(Better in fullscreen !) 3RD PARTY ASSETS :
  • Flatboy (hero) : https://www.gameart2d.com/the-boy---free-sprites.html
  • Forest Road Background (Unity Asset Store) - Background
  • https://opengameart.org/content/tree-game-ornament Trees

  • virus death sound https://freesound.org/people/OtisJames/sounds/249613/
  • https://www.dafont.com/open-season.font?l[]=10&l[]=1 Font
  • Music: “Wacky Race”, from PlayOnLoop.com
